name: Half Cookie
description: Half Cookie is a new generation loyalty
overview:
Half Cookie is a new generation loyalty company.

Loyalty is the outcome of a great customer engagement and genuine appreciation shown by business to its customers for their patronage. This is the underlying philosophy of Half Cookie’s innovative new loyalty product named Glee.

Glee engages, entices, and rewards patrons of your retail business in an effective yet fun way. Glee is built using cutting edge Social, Location and Mobile technologies.

Glee resides on consumer’s mobile and is available on all popular mobile platforms including iOS, Android, BlackBerry and mobile web. Glee loyalty program can also be deployed with paper cards ,each having unique QR code printed on it to deliver that next generation loyalty experience.

Glee is ready and you can deploy it in less than than 24 hours. Its super easy for both your customers to use and for you to deploy.

The benefits you will see after embracing Glee is in increased sales, customer loyalty and brand advocacy for your retail business. In the process you also get enlghted with rich analytics and insights.

Glee is determined to remove boredom out of those old stale loyalty programs
